high_level_findings: Guest I/O Stall (DoS) due to missing work rescheduling in vhost_scsi_handle_vq when weight limit is exceeded.
Host Memory Exhaustion (DoS) due to integer underflow in exp_data_len calculation allowing huge allocation requests.
Resource Leak in vhost_scsi_target_queue_cmd if target_init_cmd fails (less likely but confirmed logic error).
